review.title: “Good working environment, lowest salary in the industry”
review.pros: Pros – 1. Best company to work with for a fresher.2. Great exposure to technologies and end to end involvement in development life cycle.3. Good working environment
review.cons: Cons – 1. Lowest salary in the industry.2. No value for the extra hours you work.3. Stringent log tracking, need to work 40 hours a week and only the log from 8AM to 8PM is counted while calculating daily log.4. The worst HR department that a company can ever have. They never reply to your mails and will flood your mail box with crap mails.5. Not so efficient appraisal system, no transparent criteria for salary increment.6. They may decide to not to give a pay raise because no company in Technopark has given a pay raise.7. No option to Work From Home.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Management should make their policies a little bit more employee friendly and should make sure that all employees are getting what they deserve. Rather than recruiting a lot of inexperienced people, they should try to retain their critical resources, otherwise it is going to be a mess, as most of their accounts depends on these resources.

review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Compensation & Benefits are very poor. Admin & HR section is not always sync with other employee.

review.title: “OK company for VLSI, Good For Software/Embedded”
review.pros: Pros – Main branch Located at Technopark and it is a happening place. Some good projects can give you good exposure and grow.
review.cons: Cons – Management chaos for individual growth. Not enough recognitions for work. Opportunities at work are not provided as a right to everyone.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Please do not focus only on mistakes that have happened, rather move ahead on implementation of methodology to avoid it. Appreciation for work can keep engineers motivated.
